species.name: beedrill
descriptions: A BEEDRILL is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should  ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.
Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
It has 3 poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.
